mapper.insert:
select seq_nno.nextval from dual
insert into notice( nno, ecno, cno, mid, ncategory, ntitle, ncontent, nhitcount, nattach, nattachoname, nattachtype, ncreatedat ) values ( #{nno}, #{ecno}, #{cno}, #{mid}, #{ncategory}, #{ntitle}, #{ncontent}, #{nhitcount}, #{nattach}, #{nattachoname}, #{nattachtype}, sysdate )
mapper.select:
select count(nno) from ( select distinct nno, ecno, cno, mid, ncategory, ntitle, ncontent, ncreatedat, nupdatedat from ( select nno, ecno, cno, mid, ncategory, ntitle, ncontent, ncreatedat, nupdatedat from notice where ecno is null
union
select nno, ecno, cno, mid, ncategory, ntitle, ncontent, ncreatedat, nupdatedat from notice where cno is null
union all
select nno, ecno, cno, mid, ncategory, ntitle, ncontent, ncreatedat, nupdatedat from notice ) order by ncreatedat desc )
